name: Craft Cool Mesh Superlight Short Sleeve Top - Men's
categories: Cool Mesh Superlight Short Sleeve Top
description:
Stay cool on days when the tarmac shimmers and there’s no escaping the sun. Layer the Stay Cool top under a jersey, or wear it on its own, the lightweight material will do its best to keep you comfortable.Lightweight recycled polyester spandex blend wicks moisture.Tight weave with large mesh promotes breathability.Craft’s products tend to fit long and lean. So, if your fit tends to fall between sizes, Craft suggests sizing up.
